inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Einfache Anzeige für jeden Endverbraucher, keine technische Ausbildung nötig
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the strengths of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Einfache Überprüfung für Konsumenten, ob Lebensmittel und Medikamente dienrichtige Temperatur haben.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What effects do you expect your idea to have?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Einfache optische Anzeige von parametern ohne zusätzliche technische Geräte.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How is the problem you are solving solved?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Preis, Zuverlässigkeit
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What problems do you expect your idea to have?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Kostendruck bei Lebensmitteln, bei pharmazeutischen Produkten muss Fälschungssicherheit gegeben sein.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the weaknesses of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Direkte und unsichtbare Integration von Temperatursensoren in jedes Objekt.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What's new in your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Anwendungen auch im Sichehreitsbereich, ob eine kritische Temperatur überschritten wurde.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What goals idea to have?

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: Use TCO coating as temperature sensitive label (i.e. bottle lable for wine to indicate right temperature for consumption - just to highlight one use case) - many more cases in mind dependant on cost and sensitivity

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Connaisseure, Ärzte, ...
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What is the intended target group for your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Integration der Sensoren in flexible Pflaster
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How is the problem you are solving solved?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Sportler, Patienten, selbstoptimierer
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What is the intended target group for your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: TCO alleine ermöglicht die Funktion nicht. Silberleitlack wäre evtl. schon ausreichend.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the weaknesses of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Erfassen von Vitalparametern mit komfortabel tragbarer Elektronik
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What's new in your idea?

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: TCO Stickers monitor heartbeat, body temperature and other health factors directly on your skin.

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Flexible, tragbare Elektronik zur Messung von Gesundheit und Fitnessdaten.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: Describe your vision for the idea.

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: an invisible sticker could be attached to any surface in your home and connects via wifi to a „smart-home-hub“ it would make preexisting „non-smart“ objects like doorhandles and light switches „smart“ when combined with a certain behavior. example:if a window is opened at a certain temperature the air-condition reacts and stops heating - cause not every part of a system has to be able to react.
gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: interaktive sticker

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Eine Sonnenbrille kann man schnell absetzen, wenn man zB in einen Tunnel fährt.
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the weaknesses of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Unauffälliger als eine Sonnenbrille
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the strengths of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Verändertes Absorptionsverhalten der Kontaktlinse
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How is the problem you are solving solved?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Tragen des Sonnenschutzes direkt auf den Augen
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How does your idea work?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Nie wieder die Sonnenbrille vergessen, kein verrutschen der Brille,
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What makes your idea better than existing solutions?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Wanderer, Sportler, Senioren
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What is the intended target group for your idea?

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: My idea already exists for sun-glasses but you could transfere it to contact lenses so that the surfaces darkens automatically when exposed to sunlight.

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Einfaches Verfügbarmachen von Sonnenschutz, ohne eine zusätzliche Sonnenbrille mitzutragen. Senioren, die oft empfindliche Augen haben, brauchen keine Brille mit extra seitenschutz
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: Describe your vision for the idea.

gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: material stress
gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: Transparent coating applied by spraying or as adhesive mat. The layer reacts on different impacts (mechanical micro-disruption, temperature, vibration, chemicals, ...) and indicates the affected area by changing from transparant to a highly visible color. Could be used for sensitive parts like wings of planes or important elements of a bridge.

gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: Digital Post-its
gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: Use TCO als a small flexible transparent display you could attach like a post-it onto a flip-cart to show video content etc.

To monitor the vital functions and photosynthesis of trees in cities or special plants you could place a transparent tag with TCO-circuits directly on an leave of a certain plant.
Plantform – Plattform für alles Stakeholder (Agrarimdustrie, Community, Stadtversorgung)

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Blätter fallen ab, Outdoor-Tauglichkeit der Technologie, woher kommt die Energie?
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the weaknesses of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman:
TCO auf einem „Referenzblatt“, (evtl. am Stamm) bietet ——> Ring um Stamm
Verknüpfung mit GIS
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How is the problem you are solving solved?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman:
Für Industrie und unterschiedliche Arten von Endnutzern (großer Markt)
Langzeitdaten erheben, schnell intervenieren Predictive Maintenance für Bäume, insbesondere in trockenen Gegendem
Community und Nachbarschaften stärken
Mensch-Natur-Technik Netzwerke, Crowd-Gardening
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the strengths of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman:
Bisher Analysen über indirekte Verfahren
Weniger Abhängigkeit von „intuitivem Wissen“
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What's new in your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Security with regard to the freshness of products Simple to understand highly efficient
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What effects do you expect your idea to have?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: TCO - Beschichtung macht „einfache Oberflächen“ an einer kleinen ausgewählten Stelle smart
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How is the problem you are solving solved?

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: Use TCO coating as temperature sensitive label (i.e. bottle lable for wine to indicate right temperature for consumption - just to highlight one use case) - many more cases in mind dependant on cost and sensitivity

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Kostenintensität bei Massenproduktion (Wiederverwendbarkeit?)
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What problems do you expect your idea to have?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Kosten? Insbesondere bei hohen Stückzahlen?
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the weaknesses of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Many use cases, hoher Bedarf bei Endkunden
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the strengths of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Mehr Sicherheit in Ernährung Mehr Transparenz für Produktionsprozesse
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What goals idea to have?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: günstige, biegsame, Sensorik zur Überwachung Temperatur-sensitiver Logistik (Nahrungsmittel / Organe), verlässliches Gütesiegel
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What's new in your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Direkter Nutzen für Patienten / Kunden aber auch Unternehmen (Positionierung)
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What are the strengths of your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: TCO Beschichtung als direkt–Feedback
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How is the problem you are solving solved?

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content:
This tag could be attached to doorhandles, water faucets, toilet seats and other objects in public toilettes to control and remind the cleaning personal to disinfect in a appropriate interval.
could be attached to existing facilities…

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Schnelle Sichtbarkeit von Reinigungsbedarf, ermöglicht Reinigen nach Bedarf (und damit Zeitersparnis)
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What's new in your idea?

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: My idea already exists for sun-glasses but you could transfere it to contact lenses so that the surfaces darkens automatically when exposed to sunlight.
gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: sun contact lenses automatische Sonnenlinse

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: TCO Stickers monitor heartbeat, body temperature and other health factors directly on your skin.

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Sportaffine, Senioren, Jeder
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What is the intended target group for your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Wohlfühlgefühl inkl digitalen Therapeut und bei Senioren Monitoring Gesundheitszustand
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: Describe your vision for the idea.

gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: active wallpaper
gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: a TCO wallpaper could add more functions to a normal wall and could be used more like a big interface. Control your smart home, change temperature, turn on/off lights … use gestures like swiping along the wall to dimm the light , etc.

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Sauberkeit, keimfrei, mehr Qualität
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What goals idea to have?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Öffentliche Einrichtungen und Institutionen, Hotels, Unternehmen
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What is the intended target group for your idea?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Wird nicht mehr richtig gereinigt
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: What problems do you expect your idea to have?

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: 2 Anwendungsbereiche a sichtbar wenn Keime vorhanden sind bzw. Reinigung notwendig b Sprühvariante als Controlling
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: How could the idea be implemented differently?

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content:
This tag could be attached to doorhandles, water faucets, toilet seats and other objects in public toilettes to control and remind the cleaning personal to disinfect in a appropriate interval.
could be attached to existing facilities…

inov:TextualRefinement.oid:contentGerman: Keimfrei, Sauberkeit, digitale Wächter
inov:TextualRefinement.dcterms:description: Describe your vision for the idea.

gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: interaktive sticker
gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: an invisible sticker could be attached to any surface in your home and connects via wifi to a „smart-home-hub“ it would make preexisting „non-smart“ objects like doorhandles and light switches „smart“ when combined with a certain behavior. example:if a window is opened at a certain temperature the air-condition reacts and stops heating - cause not every part of a system has to be able to react.

Transparent coating applied by spraying or as adhesive mat. The layer reacts on different impacts (mechanical micro-disruption, temperature, vibration, chemicals, ...) and indicates the affected area by changing from transparant to a highly visible color. Could be used for sensitive parts like wings of planes or important elements of a bridge.
gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: material stress
circuit leaves!
gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: To monitor the vital functions and photosynthesis of trees in cities or special plants you could place a transparent tag with TCO-circuits directly on an leave of a certain plant.

a TCO wallpaper could add more functions to a normal wall and could be used more like a big interface. Control your smart home, change temperature, turn on/off lights … use gestures like swiping along the wall to dimm the light , etc.
gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: active wallpaper

gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: interaktive sticker

gi2mo:Idea.gi2mo:content: Using TCO technology for solar panel finishing in future: With TCO technology solar panel applications can be supplied with a flexible electrified surface finish, covering a wide field of use cases.
gi2mo:Idea.dcterms:title: SOLAR PANEL SURFACES
